Title: AN ACT GIVING THE NAME OF FLORENTINO TORRES TO A STREET OF MANILA.
Data:
[ Act No. 3398, December 05, 1927 ]
AN ACT GIVING THE NAME OF FLORENTINO TORRES TO A STREET OF MANILA.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the rent authority of the same:
Section 1. In order to perpetuate the memory of the illustrious magistrate Florentino Torres, the street now called Almanza, a name which bears no recollections for the Filipinos, shall henceforth be known as Florentino Torres Street.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, December 5, 1927.
